entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
